name: A. Mind the Gap
statement:
These days Arkady works as an air traffic controller at a large airport.
He controls a runway which is usually used for landings only. Thus, he
has a schedule of planes that are landing in the nearest future, each
landing lasts 1 minute.He was asked to insert one takeoff in the
schedule. The takeoff takes 1 minute itself, but for safety reasons
there should be a time space between the takeoff and any landing of at
least s minutes from both sides.Find the earliest time when Arkady can
insert the takeoff.
